full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSANG LHA DGRA LHA MCHED DGU LHA SER PO BUM DGRA LHA DMAR PO BUM DGRA LHA DKAR PO BUM DGRA LHA NAG PO BUM DGRA LHA'I BSKANG GSO BSHAGS PA SKUL BSTOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES PA DGRA LHA'I BSKANG GSO DGA' DGA' BO RGYAL BYED ZHES 'DI NI RANG GIS MCHED GROGS RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS GYIS STE NAS YOD PA'I YIG CHA BSKANG GSO MA THONG KYANG, ,DGRA LHA DBANG BSTOD LA GZHI BYAS NAS BKOD PA 'DI NI SNGAGS 'CHANG SMON LAM LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'I YIG GI BA NI RIGS GNAS SKAR RTZES SOGS DU MA LA MKHAS PA RNAM 'BYOD CAN BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUGS PA'O, ,)
